actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Labor and Human Resources.

actions.in_committee: Committee on Labor and Human Resources
Committee on Labor and Human Resources
actions.text: Committee on Labor and Human Resources requested executive comment from Education Department; GAO; OMB.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Education, Arts, and Humanities

official_title: A bill to require any educational agency receiving Federal funds to allow parental review of textbooks.

summary.text: Amends the General Education Provisions Act to require any educational agency receiving Federal funds to allow parental review of text books. Sets forth provisions governing civil actions for damages or equitable relief brought by persons aggrieved by a violation of such requirement.

titles.title: A bill to require any educational agency receiving Federal funds to allow parental review of textbooks.
